title: Long loading time after match to see scoreboard
body: Long loading time ... after match, maybe someone know how to fix it ? Cuz i always have to wait after match 2-3 min to see scoreboard and to press play again :DD

replies.body: You might have the option [Close client during game](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) enabled.  This will close the client while in a match to reduce PC stress, but as a result takes the client a bit to relaunch afterwards.  Unchecking it should speed things up!
